nodes.text: Staff Sergeant Rothax was a member of the Galactic Empire's Galactic Marines.
During 1 ABY, Staff Sergeant Rothax was stationed in the Talus Imperial Outpost, where he offered weapons and armor to Imperials who served valiantly in battle.
He was rumored to have given a sword to an unknown Imperial that was similar, or in fact the same as the Sword of Ajunta Pall.

Rothax is a Non-Player Character (NPC) in the MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies. He was added to the game in Game Update 10 as part of the new Player versus Player battlefields. He offers a variety of weapons and armor to Imperial players who fight consistently on the battlefields.
